parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Teams

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the leader of given team. Effect is local, unless both leader unit and team are local to PC on which command is executed, then effect is global.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> team '''setLeader''' leader

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> team: [[Team Member]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> leader: [[Team Member]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>(example)</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[commandFollow]], [[doFollow]], [[formationLeader]], [[formLeader]], [[isFormationLeader]], [[leader]], [[selectLeader]]
</value></part></template>
